name: Intensive Exposure
description: Intensive Exposure is a fast paced game in which you have to expose yourself as many times as possible without getting caught by security.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 7800 (512MB cache) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A faith based casual adventure game that's fun for the whole family
I was using Windows 7 Professional and only upgraded to Windows 10 to play this, kinda silly, but the game is funny as hell (Y)
Finally I can flash people and not become a registered sex offender in the process! ♥♥♥♥♥ out for Harambe in this game, LITERALLY. 11/10
Just started playing it and I think it's a fun little game. Well worth the money. It's a nice game to burn some time and you might even chuckle a bit.  Cons: only 3 levels.

So, this game's got my attention, since it seems quite unique. I launch it I play it a little I laugh a lot I quit the game and rate an exhibicionist simulator game 10/10 I hope nothing's wrong with me :D
